mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_NO AS USER_NO, U.USER_ID AS USER_ID, U.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME, R1.CHAT_ROOM_NO AS CHAT_ROOM_NO FROM USER_TBL U join CHAT_ROOM_USER_TBL R1 ON U.USER_NO = R1.USER_NO_1 OR U.USER_NO = R1.USER_NO_2 WHERE USER_NO != #{userNo}
SELECT USER_ID, USER_NAME FROM USER_TBL WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT CHAT_ROOM_NO FROM CHAT_ROOM_USER_TBL WHERE (USER_NO_1 = #{userNo1} AND USER_NO_2 = #{msgSendNo}) OR (USER_NO_1 = #{msgSendNo} AND USER_NO_2 = #{userNo1})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT_ROOM_TBL VALUES((SELECT CHAT_ROOM_NO FROM CHAT_ROOM_USER_TBL WHERE (USER_NO_1 = #{userNo1} AND USER_NO_2 = #{msgSendNo}) OR (USER_NO_1 = #{msgSendNo} AND USER_NO_2 = #{userNo1})), (SELECT USER_NAME FROM USER_TBL WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo1}))

INSERT INTO MSG_TBL VALUES(SEQ_MSG_NO.NEXTVAL,(SELECT CHAT_ROOM_NO FROM CHAT_ROOM_USER_TBL WHERE (USER_NO_1 = #{userNo1} AND USER_NO_2 = #{msgSendNo}) OR (USER_NO_1 = #{msgSendNo} AND USER_NO_2 = #{userNo1})),#{msgSendNo},SYSTIMESTAMP,#{msgContent})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CHAT_ROOM_USER_TBL WHERE (USER_NO_1 = #{userNo1} AND USER_NO_2 = #{userNo2}) or (USER_NO_1 = #{userNo2} AND USER_NO_2 = #{userNo1})
